SEARCH
Package distributed.RMI

Interface ServerRMIInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServer
public interface ServerRMIInterface extends Remote
Class that represents the interface for an RMI Server. This class calls methods from Controller in order to manage the game flow.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      void startServer(ServerRMIInterface serverRmi) throws RemoteException
      Method that starts a specific Server (given in input as a parameter).
      Parameters:
      serverRmi - is a specific RMIServer that has to be started
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred during a remote call

    • initClient

      ArrayList<Integer> initClient(ClientInterface rmiClient) throws IOException, AlreadyBoundException, ClassNotFoundException
      Method used to initialize a specific Client (given in input as a parameter).
      Parameters:
      rmiClient - is a specific RMIClient that has to be initialized
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Integer that represents the clients
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs
      AlreadyBoundException - if a client has already been initialized
      ClassNotFoundException - if a class cannot be loaded

    • sendMessage

      util.Event sendMessage(int gameIndex, Object obj, util.Event event) throws IOException
      Method used to send messages from the Server to the Clients.
      Parameters:
      gameIndex - an int that represents the index for a match (More that a single match)
      obj - a generic object that can be passed to the client to update its view (can be null)
      event - a specific Event used together with the object
      Returns:
      an Event used to check
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs

    • getModel

      Object getModel(int gameIndex, util.Event event, Object clientIndex) throws RemoteException
      Method used to get info from the model classes.
      Parameters:
      gameIndex - an int that represents the index for a match (More that a single match)
      event - a specific Event that represents an action to be performed
      clientIndex - the index of a specific client
      Returns:
      an Object that is needed to perform some action
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during a remote call

    • getDisconnection

      boolean getDisconnection(int matchIndex) throws RemoteException
      Method used to manage the disconnections.
      Parameters:
      matchIndex - an int that represents the index for a match (More that a single match)
      Returns:
      a boolean, if a clients disconnects true, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during a remote call
